about_the_game:
Scarlet Woods is a young witch-in-training who lives with her adoptive aunts. One day, things started to go wild in her usually quiet town of Hollow Falls. Join her and her best friend Violet as they take on adventures filled with fun and magic.

Lunar Manor is a visual novel that features point-and-click mechanics. Explore the enchanting town of Hollow Falls; each location is beautifully detailed and crafted to pull you into the magical world.
detailed_description:
Scarlet Woods is a young witch-in-training who lives with her adoptive aunts. One day, things started to go wild in her usually quiet town of Hollow Falls. Join her and her best friend Violet as they take on adventures filled with fun and magic.

Lunar Manor is a visual novel that features point-and-click mechanics. Explore the enchanting town of Hollow Falls; each location is beautifully detailed and crafted to pull you into the magical world.

name: Lunar Manor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad 2.7 Ghz, AMD Phenom(TM)II X4 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770, 1024 MB, Shader Model 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: An illness strikes Hollow Falls, and only the best witches can save the town from it. Lunar Manor is the story of a young witch named Scarlet, a girl doing her best to become independent and reliable. Join her in this journey across beautiful scenery as she grows in friendship, love, family, and magic.
